task.title: Displaying domain attribute associated with widgets

taskbody.context: There are several ways to display the domain attribute associated with widgets.

step.cmd: Select the widget (for example, an attribute or column header).

choices.choice: Go to the Properties view pane and select the General tab. The name of the domain attribute is displayed in the Domain Attribute property.

Go to the Domain outline view. Any attributes linked to the selected widgets are highlighted. You can select any type of widget, including boxes. In this case, all attributes attached to widgets that are contained within the box are highlighted.

taskbody.postreq: You can double-click the widget to open the Domain Designer with the relevant domain attribute selected.
